QuestData.Title: Filling the Tanks
QuestData.Description:
<The containment pack appears to be intact, albeit empty. Perhaps refilling it with the appropriate mixture of liquids will render it functional once more.
Slaying the correct combination of slimes should provide all the fluid necessary.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay the variety of slimes to fill the tanks with fluid.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Boil Master Yetch at the House of Plagues.

Objectives.Objective: Slay Volatile Jelly in the House of Plagues
Slay Constructed Ooze in the Stitchyard
Slay Bubbling Sclerosis in the Theater of Pain
Slay Necrotic Droplet in the Temple of Courage
Slay Primordial Sludge in the Blistering Bog
Slay Resonant Misery in the Maw
Slay Congealed Ash in the Ember Ward
Slay Bubbling Purity in The Temple of Purity
Slay Bubbleblood in the Forgotten Wounds
